label: Logo Irrigazione manuale
info:
First Step to adapt S7-node to logo-node

LogoComfort side:

Tools-->Ethernet connections
Enter:
-LOGO IP adress
-Subnet Mask
-Default Gateway

Right Click on Ethernet connections
Add Server connection --> S7 Connection
Double click on connection1

Tick Connect with an Operator Panel (OP)
It will change TSAP to 02.00

Tick Accept all connection requests (Or you know what you do)

Remote Properties (Client) TSAP: 01.00

Red Node Side:
Menu (Upper Right)-->Import-->Clipboard
Paste flow
Import

In S7-LOGO8 Flow
Double click on LOGO8
PLC properties (little pencil)
Change for your Red Node IP adress

Deploy
Now you could already read all I/O of Logo

name: luceesterna-on
func:
context.global.luceesterna=0
return msg;

name: luceesterna-off
func:
context.global.luceesterna=1
return msg;

name: presacomandata-on
func:
context.global.presacomandata=0
return msg;

name: presacomandata-off
func:
context.global.presacomandata=1
return msg;

name: Termometro sala
format:
<script src="/myjs/RGraph/RGraph.common.core.js" ></script>
<script src="/myjs/RGraph/RGraph.gauge.js" ></script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">

           (function(scope){ 
                scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
                   gauge3.value=[msg.temperature];
                   gauge3.grow();
                });
            })(scope);
            
            var gauge3 = new RGraph.Gauge({
                id: 'cvs',
                min: 0,
                max: 50,
                value: [23],
                options: {
                    titleBottom: 'Sala',
                    titleBottomSize: '16',
                    titleBottomFont: 'Impact',
                    titleBottomColor: '#ff8888',
                    titleBottomPos: 0.25,
                    backgroundColor: 'black',
                    backgroundGradient: true,
                    centerpinColor: '#666',
                    needleSize: [100],
                    needleColors: ['Gradient(transparent:yellow:orange:#ff8888:#ff8888)'],
                    textColor: 'white',
                    tickmarksBigColor: 'white',
                    tickmarksMediumColor: 'white',
                    tickmarksSmallColor: 'white',
                    borderWidth: 1,
                    borderOuter: '#666',
                    borderInner: '#3333',
                    colorsRanges: [
                                     [0,10,'rgba(0,0,255,0.6)'], 
                                    [10,20,'rgba(0,128,255,0.6)'], 
                                    [20,30,'rgba(0,204,0,1)'], 
                                    [30,40,'rgba(255,255,0,1)'], 
                                    [40,50,'rgba(255,0,0,1)']
                                  ],
                    textAccessible: true
                }
            });
            gauge3.grow();

    </script>

    <canvas id="cvs" width="300" height="300">[No canvas support]</canvas>
